INVALID_USER_PASSWORD_ERROR.message: Password authentication failed. The value in http header of X-Cybozu-Authorization is not valid.

INVALID_API_TOKEN_ERROR.message: The specified API token does not match the API token generated via an app. If the settings are correct, you might have missed to click "Update App"

NO_PERMISSION_API_TOKEN_ERROR.message: Using this API token, you cannot run the specified API.

INVALID_APP_ID_ERROR.message: The app (ID: %APP_ID%) not found. The app may have been deleted.

IMPORT_EXPORT_SPECIFIED_TOGETHER_COMMAND.message: The options --import and --export cannot be specified together!

INVALID_LINE_ERROR.message: expected argument for flag `-l', but got option `%INVALID_LINE_NUMBER%'

INVALID_GUEST_SPACE_ARGUMENT_PARSING_ERR.message: invalid argument for flag `-g' (expected uint64): strconv.ParseUint: parsing "%VALUE%": invalid syntax

INVALID_GUEST_SPACE_ARGUMENT_ERROR.message: expected argument for flag `-g', but got option `%VALUE%'
